Client

Subject-7 is a zero coding platform that allows anyone with basic QA knowledge create and execute robust software test automation through the web interface.

Objective

Client developed the initial version of the platform using in-house resources. Once the platform started to gain traction they needed an experienced software development team to scale up platform enhancement and provide ongoing maintenance & support services.

Solution

After conducting a thorough platform architecture review, Achievion team implemented features that created a huge user experience boost.

Features include:

  • Browser based test execution script management on top of Selenium framework
  • Mobile app test execution powered by Appium
  • Application load testing leveraging JMeter framework
  • API layer for integration with popular DevOps tools

Result

After several years of working with Achievion team, the client deployed the platform to a large number of enterprise customers in both commercial and federal sectors. We are proud to be a key contributor to one of the fastest and easiest software testing automation platforms on the market.

excerpt.rendered: Zero coding test automation platform for ensuring web and mobile software quality.
